attributes.action: Declare the result of the EU referendum null and void
attributes.background:
The information disseminated by the leave campaign was described by Michael Dougan, Professor of Law at Liverpool university, as "dishonesty on an industrial scale."
It is wrong that a decision of such magnitude should be allowed to stand when it has been affected by such levels of misinformation.

rejection.details: Apologies, the link we previously sent was incorrect. We cannot accept the petition that you submitted as it is very similar to the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
